column4: ubuntu  10.10 on wubi .. its on a dell mini 10 .. i installed the restricted driver for it ( it works fine .. but i think its on installed properly ) returns a error code -1 .. thats why all other packages despite the fact installs ok still says installation failure
I would recommend avoiding wubi if possible.
The upgrade should go as smoothly as with a normal install (and this is the first release of Wubi where I can say that with some confidence).
